Worcester.North High School (Worcester, Massachuse:
North High School (or Worcester North) is a public four-year high school and one of five public high schools in Worcester, Massachusetts.
The original North High was located on Harrington Way and was built in 1972 as a junior high school. It became North High in 1980 when the old North High on Salisbury Street was closed, sold to a private developer and subsequently turned into condos.
